name: Set of Four Wharton Esherick Captains Chairs 1955

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use. VERY GOOD VINTAGE CONDITION.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Set of Four Wharton Esherick Captain’s Chairs, 1955 A rare set of four handcrafted Captain’s chairs by Wharton Esherick, featuring sculpted walnut frames and newly replaced saddle leather straps with a rich patina. Materials: Walnut, saddle leather Dimensions: 30" H × 24" W × 21" D Condition: Scratches throughout, consistent with age and use; leather straps are new with patina.
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
Set of Four Wharton Esherick Captain’s Chairs, 1955
A rare set of four handcrafted Captain’s chairs by Wharton Esherick, featuring sculpted walnut frames and newly replaced saddle leather straps with a rich patina.
Materials: Walnut, saddle leather
Dimensions: 30" H × 24" W × 21" D
Condition: Scratches throughout, consistent with age and use; leather straps are new with patina.
